original_text: “Say to Rehoboam the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and to all the house of Judah and Benjamin, and to the rest of the people,
korean_text: 솔로몬의 아들 유다 왕 르호보암과 유다와 베냐민 온 족속과 또 그 남은 백성에게 말하여 이르기를

sentences.original_text: Say to Rehoboam the son of Solomon,
and to all the house of Judah and Benjamin,
and to the rest of the people,
